WRITING.TEXT: Ahh, I see. What about the Carthaginian generals, were they any good (aside from Hannibal and the Barcid family)?
Cool, thanks for the response. Could you also inform me on how effective these mercenary armies were in combat against Carthage's enemies?

WRITING.TITLE: Did the Carthaginians really rely mainly on mercenaries to do all their fighting?
WRITING.TEXT: From what I've heard and read, the Carthaginian military relied heavily on mercenary fighters to do all of the city's fighting, which was an okay strategy when they were able to pay those mercenaries.
